description: From French, from Latin abstergens, present participle of abstergeo (“wiping off”).

adjectives.description: abstergent (comparative more abstergent, superlative most abstergent)

entries.meaning: Cleansing, detergent. [First attested in the early 17th century.]
A substance used to cleanse; a detergent. [First attested in the early 17th century.]
